树状菜单Trees

树状菜单具有天然的父子关系阐述能力，有利于用户对各级内容的查看和查找。如：国家/城市/地区、操作系统/设备类型/品牌、部门/科室/人员…使用树状菜单可以完整展示其中的层级关系，并具有展开收起选择等交互功能。

基本样式 

		
<div class="ndp-tree-wrapper" name="plain-tree"></div>
		
	
		
$("div[name='plain-tree']").tree({
		data:[{label:"FATHER ONE",sub:[
				{label:"1-1",sub:[
					{label:"1-1-1"},
					{label:"1-1-2"},
					{label:"1-1-3"}
				]},
				{label:"1-2",sub:[
					{label:"1-2-1",sub:[{label:"hello123"}]},
					{label:"1-2-2"},
					{label:"1-2-3"}							
				]},
				{label:"1-3"}
			 ]},
			  {label:"father two",sub:[
					{label:"3-1-1"},
					{label:"3-1-2"},
					{label:"3-1-3"}							  
			  ]},
			  {label:"hello 1"},
			  "hello 2",
			  {label:"hello3",sub:[
					{label:"5-2-1"},
					{label:"5-2-2"},
					{label:"5-2-3"}							  
			  ]}
		]
}).on("LEAF_CLICK",function(e){
	//叶子节点被点击
	console.log(e.originalEvent.data);//{val:叶子节点的值 string}
});

带装饰图标 

		
<div class="ndp-tree-wrapper" name="icon-tree"></div>
		
	
		
$("div[name='icon-tree']").tree({
	data:[{label:"FATHER ONE",sub:[
			{label:"1-1",sub:[
				{label:"1-1-1"},
				{label:"1-1-2"},
				{label:"1-1-3"}
			]},
			{label:"1-2",sub:[
				{label:"1-2-1",sub:[{label:"hello123"}]},
				{label:"1-2-2"},
				{label:"1-2-3"}							
			]},
			{label:"1-3"}
		 ]},
		  {label:"father two",sub:[
				{label:"3-1-1"},
				{label:"3-1-2"},
				{label:"3-1-3"}							  
		  ]},
		  {label:"hello 1"},
		  "hello 2",
		  {label:"hello3",sub:[
				{label:"5-2-1"},
				{label:"5-2-2"},
				{label:"5-2-3"}							  
		  ]}
	],
	folder:"",
	file:""
}).on("LEAF_CLICK",function(e){
	//叶子节点被点击
	console.log(e.originalEvent.data);//{val:叶子节点的值 string}
});

可被多选 

		
<div class="ndp-tree-wrapper" name="check-tree"></div>
		
	
		
$("div[name='check-tree']").tree({
	data:[{label:"FATHER ONE",sub:[
			{label:"1-1",sub:[
				{label:"1-1-1"},
				{label:"1-1-2"},
				{label:"1-1-3"}
			]},
			{label:"1-2",sub:[
				{label:"1-2-1",sub:[{label:"hello123"}]},
				{label:"1-2-2"},
				{label:"1-2-3"}							
			]},
			{label:"1-3"}
		 ]},
		  {label:"father two",sub:[
				{label:"3-1-1"},
				{label:"3-1-2"},
				{label:"3-1-3"}							  
		  ]},
		  {label:"hello 1"},
		  "hello 2",
		  {label:"hello3",sub:[
				{label:"5-2-1"},
				{label:"5-2-2"},
				{label:"5-2-3"}							  
		  ]}
	],
	folder:"<i class='glyphicon glyphicon-folder-open'></i>",
	file:"<i class='glyphicon glyphicon-file'></i>",				
	checkbox:true
}).on("LEAF_CHECK",function(e){ //发生check  uncheck 事件
	console.log(e.originalEvent.data);//{val:叶子节点的值 string,check:true|false  boolean 是否选中}
});
